clearcontrol.microscope.stacks

Class StackRecyclerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.microscope.stacks.StackRecyclerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface

    public class StackRecyclerManager
extends VirtualDevice
    StackRecyclerManager handle a collection of named stack recyclers used for different purposes. Methods are available to clear all recyclers.
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Detail

      • getRecycler

        public coremem.recycling.RecyclerInterface<StackInterface,StackRequest> getRecycler(java.lang.String pName,
                                                                                    int pMaximumNumberOfLiveObjects,
                                                                                    int pMaximumNumberOfAvailableObjects)
        Requests a recycler with given characteristics, if it already exists and it has the right characteristics then it is used, otherwise a new one is created.
        Parameters:
        pName - recycler's name
        pMaximumNumberOfLiveObjects - maximum number of live objects
        pMaximumNumberOfAvailableObjects - maximum number of available objects
        Returns:
        requested recycler
